name: I Want Dr. Pepper
description:
Man, I kinda want Dr.  Pepper right now. 
Supa short and supa realistic visual novel simulation game about the hunt for Dr. Pepper :)
*
*
*
Totally not sponsored and totally not endorsed by Dr. Pepper!!
Music from Nintendo/Miitopia soundtrack + Andrew Huang "Ooh" Album :)
Made in 4 hours on a mac lolol
